languages.text: {n}Ризза серьезно кивает.{/n} "Завязала, Ваша Светлость. Никаких больше нечистых амулетов и чего-то подобного. Все культисты и еретики, затесавшиеся в команду, отправились погулять в шлюз. А слуги Губительных сил, которые, воспользовавшись моей минутной слабостью, сподвигли меня на ересь, отправились на встречу со своими Темными богами". {n}Пиратка недобро улыбается.{/n} "Впрочем, сомневаюсь, что те их узнают, после того, что я сделала с их холуями".

{n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."
languages.original_text: {n}Ризза серьезно кивает.{/n} "Завязала, Ваша Светлость. Никаких больше нечистых амулетов и чего-то подобного. Все культисты и еретики, затесавшиеся в команду, отправились погулять в шлюз. А слуги Губительных сил, которые, воспользовавшись моей минутной слабостью, сподвигли меня на ересь, отправились на встречу со своими Темными богами". {n}Пиратка недобро улыбается.{/n} "Впрочем, сомневаюсь, что те их узнают, после того, что я сделала с их холуями".

languages.text: {n}リザは真剣な様子で頷く。{/n}「ええ、陛下。もう罰当たりなアミュレットも何もないわ。私のクルーとして潜伏した教団も異端者も、全部出て行った。それに、私の弱さついて異端に誘惑した禍つ神々の下僕たちも主の元に送ってやったわ」{n}リザは意地悪く笑う。{/n}「まあ、あんな姿にしてやった後じゃ、神々も配下だなんて分からないでしょうけど」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは真剣な様子で頷く。{/n}「ええ、陛下。もう罰当たりなアミュレットも何もないわ。私のクルーとして潜伏した教団も異端者も、全部出て行った。それに、私の弱さついて異端に誘惑した禍つ神々の下僕たちも主の元に送ってやったわ」{n}リザは意地悪く笑う。{/n}「まあ、あんな姿にしてやった後じゃ、神々も配下だなんて分からないでしょうけど」

languages.text: {n}Ryzza hoche la tête avec grand sérieux.{/n} « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Plus d'amulettes profanes ni rien. Les cultistes et les impies qui s'étaient infiltrés dans mon équipage ont tous été balancés par un sas. Quant aux serviteurs des Puissances de la Ruine qui avaient profité d'un moment de faiblesse pour me pousser vers l'hérésie, ils ont rejoint leurs Dieux Sombres, {n}explique Ryzza avec un sourire cruel.{/n} Enfin, je doute fort qu'ils reconnaissent leurs sbires, après ce que je leur ai fait subir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

Les cultistes et les impies qui s'étaient infiltrés dans mon équipage ont tous été balancés par un sas. Quant aux serviteurs des Puissances de la Ruine qui avaient profité d'un moment de faiblesse pour me pousser vers l'hérésie, ils ont rejoint leurs Dieux Sombres, {n}explique Ryzza avec un sourire cruel.{/n} Enfin, je doute fort qu'ils reconnaissent leurs sbires, après ce que je leur ai fait subir. »

languages.text: {n}莱萨认真地点了点头。{/n}“我已经放弃了，大人，我再也不戴什么亵渎神明的护身符了。所有混进我船员之中的邪教徒与异端分子，都被我从气闸里丢出去了。至于那些利用我一时软弱，将我推向毁灭之力的仆从，我已经送他们去见他们的黑暗诸神了。”{n}莱萨露出了充满恶意的笑容。{/n}“只是不知道，我那样收拾了他们一顿之后，黑暗诸神还能不能认得出他们来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨认真地点了点头。{/n}“我已经放弃了，大人，我再也不戴什么亵渎神明的护身符了。所有混进我船员之中的邪教徒与异端分子，都被我从气闸里丢出去了。至于那些利用我一时软弱，将我推向毁灭之力的仆从，我已经送他们去见他们的黑暗诸神了。”{n}莱萨露出了充满恶意的笑容。{/n}“只是不知道，我那样收拾了他们一顿之后，黑暗诸神还能不能认得出他们来。”

languages.text: {n}Ryzza nickt ernst.{/n} "Das habe ich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Keine gottlosen Amulette oder dergleichen mehr. Alle Kultisten und Ketzer, die sich in meine Crew geschlichen hatten, haben sich kurzerhand durch die Luftschleuse wieder verabschiedet. Und die Diener der Mächte der Zerstörung, die meinen Moment der Schwäche ausgenutzt und zur Ketzerei gebracht haben, wurden zu ihren eigenen dunklen Göttern zurückgeschickt." {n}Ryzza grinst verschlagen.{/n} "Die werden ihre Schergen nach meiner Behandlung wohl kaum wedererkannt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza nickt ernst.{/n} "Das habe ich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Keine gottlosen Amulette oder dergleichen mehr. Alle Kultisten und Ketzer, die sich in meine Crew geschlichen hatten, haben sich kurzerhand durch die Luftschleuse wieder verabschiedet. Und die Diener der Mächte der Zerstörung, die meinen Moment der Schwäche ausgenutzt und zur Ketzerei gebracht haben, wurden zu ihren eigenen dunklen Göttern zurückgeschickt." {n}Ryzza grinst verschlagen.{/n} "Die werden ihre Schergen nach meiner Behandlung wohl kaum wedererkannt haben."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza afirma con seriedad.{/n} «Así es, {mf|milord|milady}. Se acabaron los amuletos profanos y demás objetos por el estilo. También he expulsado a todos los cultistas y herejes que se habían infiltrado en mi tripulación. Y los sirvientes de los Poderes Ruinosos, que se aprovecharon de mí en un momento de debilidad y me llevaron por el camino de la herejía, han ido a conocer a sus dioses oscuros». {n}Ryzza muestra una sonrisa desagradable.{/n} «Aunque dudo que reconozcan a sus esbirros después de lo que les he hecho».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza afirma con seriedad.{/n} «Así es, {mf|milord|milady}. Se acabaron los amuletos profanos y demás objetos por el estilo. También he expulsado a todos los cultistas y herejes que se habían infiltrado en mi tripulación. Y los sirvientes de los Poderes Ruinosos, que se aprovecharon de mí en un momento de debilidad y me llevaron por el camino de la herejía, han ido a conocer a sus dioses oscuros». {n}Ryzza muestra una sonrisa desagradable.{/n} «Aunque dudo que reconozcan a sus esbirros después de lo que les he hecho».

languages.text: {n}Ryzza, ciddiyetle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Tövbe etmez olur muyum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Artık dine aykırı uğurlukları falan gözüm görmüyor. Ekibime sızan tüm tarikatçıları ve kâfirleri hava kilidinden yolcu ettik. Zafiyet anımdan istifade edip beni kâfirliğe iten tüm Yıkıcı Güç hizmetkârları da kara tanrılarına yollandı." {n}Ryzza, nahoş bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Gerçi onları öyle bir hâle soktum ki tanrıları bile kendi yardakçılarını tanıyamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza nods seriously.{/n} "I have, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No more profane amulets or anything. All cultists and heretics who wormed their way into my crew took a long walk out through a short airlock. And the servants of the Ruinous Powers who took advantage of my moment of weakness and pushed me toward heresy were sent to meet their own Dark Gods." {n}Ryzza smiles nastily.{/n} "I doubt they'll recognise their minions after what I did to them, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza, ciddiyetle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Tövbe etmez olur muyum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Artık dine aykırı uğurlukları falan gözüm görmesin. Ekibime sızan tüm tarikatçıları ve kâfirleri hava kilidinden yolcu ettik. Zafiyet anımdan istifade edip beni kâfirliğe iten tüm Yıkıcı Güç hizmetkârları da kara tanrılarına yollandı." {n}Ryzza, nahoş bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Gerçi onları getirdiğim hâlden sonra tanrıları bile kendi yardakçılarını tanıyamaz."
